channel.title: Error :p (Rep++)
channel.description: [code]client.java:15278: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class client if(c.isDonator >= 1) ^ client.java:15279: cannot find symbol symbol : variable c location: class client c.specAmount =+ 100.0; ^ 2 errors Finished! Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

item.title: Error :p (Rep++)
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

omg declare isDonator in your player class.

[quote=“mr extremez, post:12, topic:404630”][quote author=ExtremeX-Scape™ link=topic=501644.msg3670244#msg3670244 date=1310866994]

You don’t have the isDonator int.
You probably have a different specAmount variable. than what you’re posting.

Why are you so smart? <.<

Me smart?
You’re kidding right?
[/quote]
Bout to say the same thing you dont have to be smart hes just very dumb.[/quote]

i see you two (dumb and dumber, you can argue over whos dumber later) post whoring it up. shh noobs.

Read full topic
